font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 n. 剥离：the act of taking away from a person
【例】 And when it comes to finance, there is acquisition and divestiture
【近】 deprivation, dispossession
【反】 acquisition 获得；endowment 捐赠
【记】 dis 或 de去掉 + vest 衣服
